import React from 'react' const About = () => { return (

Enlighten Your Self – Season 1

Life is made up of small moments like this. As the summer vanished away, where the nature dance in wonder in transition towards a winter season, we are bringing back our volunteering days back after Covid in full force to the new autumn season. For the very first time in the history of magic valley, we are welcoming yourself to manifest the desired skills, qualities to step up and be courageous to face the future with a wide range of activities we have planned for you in our jungle treat.

Enlighten your self is a journey to ignite your qualities by a 15-day volunteering program to be held at Magic Valley Vattavada from November 20 to December 5.

The Objective of our volunteering program is to teach and develop the person within you in our environment, where you are going to tell a different story of spirituality at the end of the year. One of healing, success, health, abundance, prosperity, love, happiness, peace, and unlimited joy. Imagine discovering a stronger morality of yourselves with a wiser perspective to all problems in your life. That is how we meant to transform every single person who will be joining the season 1 and so on.

The disconnected experience from urban life includes group activities in “Meditation and spiritual guidance “, “Farming”,” Landscaping “,” Firewood Collection,” “Traditional workshop” and “artistic creativity” with free stay and food for the first 20 person who are about to register from now.

Everyone has qualities, let us surrender and embrace the opportunity for everyone learn from each other. If you are an artist who wants to connect with nature and want to carve your level of creativity in the heart of magic valley, then these 15 days of your lifetime can help other enthusiasts to learn valuable lessons from you too.

Membership and registration

Note: All volunteers will have access to lifetime membership benefits in magic valley that includes discounted stay anytime during the year. Registration Stay: Free Food: Free Note: Minimum 5 days and Maximum 15 days. We advise you to utilize this opportunity. Magic valley operates a zero-tolerance policy to drugs. Anyone found with illegal drugs will be banned forever from the venue. This is also an opportunity for those who wants to escape from the world of drugs and have faith to change their own life. You are most welcomed. Let us unite to research our valuable existence as a human being through successful programs planned for you. Take your step. Daily Routine (20th November to 5th December)
) } export default About
